text: was a Japanese professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. Takada died on 17 March 2022 in Takayama, Japan from injuries caused by a fall while skiing at the age of 40.岐阜・継子岳で滑落死か 長野の男性、スキーで入山 ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Skiing deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Footballers from Kyoto Prefecture
title: Hisanori Takada
